variables.name: topic

variables.name: wordCount
variables.description: Desired length of the blog post

prompts.title: Social Media Campaign Strategy
prompts.content:
Create a comprehensive social media campaign strategy for {{brand}} to promote {{product}}.

1. Campaign Objectives:
- Primary goal: {{goal}}
- Target metrics
- Timeline

2. Target Audience Analysis:
- Demographics
- Interests
- Pain points

3. Platform Strategy:
- Platform selection
- Content types
- Posting schedule

4. Content Themes:
- Key messages
- Hashtag strategy
- Visual guidelines

5. Engagement Plan:
- Community management
- Influencer collaboration
- User-generated content

6. Budget Allocation:
- Paid promotion
- Content creation
- Tools and resources

7. Measurement & KPIs:
- Success metrics
- Tracking methods
- Reporting schedule
prompts.description: Develop a detailed social media campaign strategy with clear objectives and actionable steps

prompts.title: Technical Documentation Template
prompts.content:
Create detailed technical documentation for {{system}} that includes:

1. System Overview:
- Purpose and scope
- Architecture diagram
- Key components

2. Technical Specifications:
- Hardware requirements
- Software dependencies
- API endpoints
- Database schema

3. Installation Guide:
- Prerequisites
- Step-by-step setup
- Configuration options
- Environment variables

4. Usage Instructions:
- Basic operations
- Advanced features
- Code examples
- Best practices

5. Troubleshooting:
- Common issues
- Error messages
- Resolution steps
- Support contacts

6. Security Considerations:
- Authentication
- Authorization
- Data protection
- Compliance requirements
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive technical documentation for software systems

variables.name: system
variables.description: Name of the system or software

prompts.title: Business Plan Generator
prompts.content:
Create a detailed business plan for {{businessName}} in the {{industry}} industry.

1. Executive Summary:
- Business concept
- Mission and vision
- Key objectives

2. Market Analysis:
- Industry overview
- Target market
- Competitor analysis
- Market opportunities

3. Business Model:
- Products/Services
- Revenue streams
- Pricing strategy
- Distribution channels

4. Marketing Strategy:
- Brand positioning
- Marketing channels
- Customer acquisition
- Sales process

5. Operations Plan:
- Location and facilities
- Equipment and technology
- Supply chain
- Quality control

6. Management Team:
- Key personnel
- Organizational structure
- Advisory board

7. Financial Projections:
- Startup costs
- Revenue forecast
- Cash flow analysis
- Break-even analysis

8. Risk Analysis:
- Potential challenges
- Mitigation strategies
- Contingency plans
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive business plans for startups and existing businesses

prompts.title: E-commerce Product Description
prompts.content:
Create a compelling product description for {{productName}} that includes:

1. Product Overview:
- Key features
- Main benefits
- Unique selling points

2. Technical Specifications:
- Dimensions: {{dimensions}}
- Materials
- Colors/variants

3. Use Cases:
- Primary applications
- Target users
- Scenarios

4. Benefits:
- Problem-solving features
- Value proposition
- Competitive advantages

5. Care Instructions:
- Maintenance tips
- Cleaning guidelines
- Storage recommendations
prompts.description: Generate persuasive product descriptions for e-commerce listings
